vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in U_BANK.Collect (patch_0.sol#26-34):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_0.sol#29-32)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_0.sol#30)
